-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | Haskell bindings to the Snowball stemming library.
--   
--   Haskell bindings to the Snowball stemming library.
@package stemmer
@version 0.5


-- | Haskell bindings for the Snowball stemming library. This module
--   contains all the low-level functions and are more or less direct
--   translations of the foreign function calls. The <a>stem</a> function
--   expects strings to use UTF-8 encoding.
module NLP.Stemmer.C

-- | Available algorithms. For English, <a>English</a> is recommended over
--   <a>Porter</a>.
data Stemmer
Danish :: Stemmer
Dutch :: Stemmer
English :: Stemmer
Finnish :: Stemmer
French :: Stemmer
German :: Stemmer
Hungarian :: Stemmer
Italian :: Stemmer
Norwegian :: Stemmer
Portuguese :: Stemmer
Romanian :: Stemmer
Russian :: Stemmer
Spanish :: Stemmer
Swedish :: Stemmer
Turkish :: Stemmer
Porter :: Stemmer

-- | Stem a word
stem :: Stemmer -> String -> IO String
instance Show Stemmer


-- | Haskell bindings for the Snowball stemming library A <tt>pure</tt>
--   stemming interface. Strings should use UTF-8 encoding.
module NLP.Stemmer

-- | Available algorithms. For English, <a>English</a> is recommended over
--   <a>Porter</a>.
data Stemmer
Danish :: Stemmer
Dutch :: Stemmer
English :: Stemmer
Finnish :: Stemmer
French :: Stemmer
German :: Stemmer
Hungarian :: Stemmer
Italian :: Stemmer
Norwegian :: Stemmer
Portuguese :: Stemmer
Romanian :: Stemmer
Russian :: Stemmer
Spanish :: Stemmer
Swedish :: Stemmer
Turkish :: Stemmer
Porter :: Stemmer

-- | Stem a word
stem :: Stemmer -> String -> String
